main_title: The Scandal of Fake War Correspondents
hook: [shocked] In the 19th century, some war heroes never set foot on the battlefield! Journalists like William Russell and Mark Twain crafted sensationalized accounts of conflicts, spinning tales so vivid that they became gospel to the public.
description: Uncover the shocking truth behind 19th-century war correspondents who fabricated sensational reports. #History #Media #War
